attributes.action: stop deliberately trying to increase the population of our very overcrowded islands and take measures to encourage a gradual reduction in overpopulation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Encouraging continual growth in our population, as this Government is actively doing, is not going to solve any economic problems (it continues to fuel house price inflation) and is creating major social, environmental and economic problems. People should be encouraged to have less children, encouraged to leave on a long-term or permanent basis and discouraged from coming here from elsewhere.
